entry.title: Replicate Fama French 3 Factor Model
entry.content:
Data Descrption

Variable NameFull NameCalculation
Momentum12 动量1212-month momentum factor(Price_end - Price_begin) / Price_begin, period: 12-month
Accrual 应记项the accounting process of recognizing revenues and expenses when they are incurredthe accrual component of a company’s earnings
Gprof 毛利率Gross ProfitabilityGross Profit / Total Assets
Oprof 营业利润率Operating ProfitabilityOperating Income / Total Assets
Noa 净经营资产Net Operating AssetsOperating Assets - Operating Liabilities
Dnoa 净经营资产变动Delta Net Operating AssetsOperating Assets_t2 - Operating Assets_t1
SG 销售增长Sales Growth(Sales_t2 - Sales_t1) / Sales_t1
ROA 总资产收益率Return on AssetsNew Income / Total Assets
ITOA 存货周转率Inventory Turnover to AssetsCost of Goods Sold / Average Total Assets
CF_P 现金流与价格比率Cash Flow to PriceCash Flow / Market Cap
FCF_P 自由现金流与价格比率Free Cash Flow to PriceFree Cash Flow / Market Cap, FCF = Operating Cash Flow - Capital Expenditures
CAPXLTG 资本支出与长期债务比率Capital Expenditure to Long-Term DebtCapatal Expenditure / Long-Term Debt
CEQG 隐含波动率Common Equity Growth(Equity_t2 - Equity_t1) / Equity_t1
FIRMTANG 公司资产的实物比率the firm-level tangibilityCompany’s tangible assets / total assets
Ivol 隐含波动率implied volatility of a stock or securityderived from option prices and reflects market expectations of future price fluctuations
Maxret 最大日收益率the maximum daily return of a stock or security over a specified periodMax(ret) in a period
Seasonality 季节性The recurring patterns or trends observed in assets prices such as months, quarters or yarsDivide the data into relevant time periods, calculate the average or median value for each time period across multiple years, compare the values of each time period to identify recurring patterns, reach to the conclusion
CEI 综合股权发行Composite Equity Issuance
nsi 净股份发行Net Share Issuance
prcdelay 价格延迟the price delay of a stock or securitythe delay between the actual price and the reported price
